DATA.BAR_GRAPH_DESC: A bar graph showing {{type}} values for {{year}}: {{locations}}
DATA.LINE_GRAPH_DESC: A line graph showing {{type}} values for over time.
DATA.DOWNLOAD_HINT: Download the current data and graphs in PowerPoint, PDF, or spreadsheet files
DATA.DOWNLOAD_ERROR: There was an error completing your download. Please try again.
DATA.GET_DATA_HINT: Access spreadsheets of full data sets from across the U.S.
DATA.SOCIAL_HINT: Share a link to this map and data, or embed the map on your website
DATA.EMBED_SHARE_HINT: Copy this embed code into your website. More information here.
DATA.EXPORT_ONE_FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Generate a file export for {{feature1}} between {{startYear}} and {{endYear}}
DATA.EXPORT_TWO_FEATURES_DESCRIPTION: Generate a file export for {{feature1}} and {{feature2}} between {{startYear}} and {{endYear}}
DATA.EXPORT_THREE_FEATURES_DESCRIPTION: Generate a file export for {{feature1}}, {{feature2}}, and {{feature3}} between {{startYear}} and {{endYear}}
DATA.EXCEL_DESCRIPTION: Export a spreadsheet of locations including eviction, census, and ACS data.
DATA.POWERPOINT_DESCRIPTION: Export a presentation with slides for locations including maps and graphs.
DATA.PDF_DESCRIPTION: Export a PDF document that includes and overview of evictions in locations and issues related to evictions.
DATA.TWEET_NO_FEATURES: View the landscape of American housing insecurity with the Eviction Lab's map tool. See eviction rates in your community and across the country, compare locations in charts and graphs, download custom reports, and more here {{link}}
DATA.TWEET_ONE_FEATURE_PER_DAY: {{place1}} had {{units}} {{action}} per day in {{year}}. That's {{total}} total {{action}}, or {{rate}}% of renter homes. Find eviction rates for your area at {{link}}
DATA.TWEET_ONE_FEATURE: {{place1}} had {{total}} {{action}} in {{year}}. That's {{rate}}% of renter homes, or {{perDay}} per day. Find eviction rates for your area at {{link}}
DATA.TWEET_TWO_FEATURES: {{place1}} {{action}} {{rate}}% of renter homes in {{year}}, more than {{place2}}. Find eviction rates for your area at {{link}}
DATA.TWEET_THREE_FEATURES: {{place1}} {{action}} {{rate}}% of renter homes in {{year}}, more than {{place2}} and {{place3}}. Find eviction rates for your area at {{link}}

HINTS.EVICTION_RATE: Represents the number of evictions per 100 renter homes.

HELP.TITLE: Help
HELP.CONTENT: Need help? Tap SEARCH to find a location. Tap MAP to look at eviction and census data. Tap on MENU and select Help & FAQ from the list to find answers to specific qestions you may have.

MAP.TITLE: Eviction Lab - Map & Data
MAP.LEGEND_HINT: The colored {{geography}} on the map represent {{attribute}} from {{min}} to {{max}}.
MAP.MAX_LOCATIONS_ERROR: Maximum limit reached. Please remove a location to add another.
MAP.NO_DATA_ERROR: Could not find data for location.

RANKINGS.TITLE: Eviction Lab - Eviction Rankings
RANKINGS.PANEL_SUMMARY: There were {{evictions}} evictions in the {{name}} area last year.  That amounts to {{evictionsPerDay}} people evicted every day.  {{evictionRate}} in 100 renter homes are evicted each year.
RANKINGS.LIST_INTRO: View {{year}} eviction rankings for locations across America. To refine your selection, choose either a city, mid-sized areas, or rural areas, and data type (eviction rate or raw eviction number).
RANKINGS.SHARE_DEFAULT: The top 10 {{areaType}} in our rankings {{action}} {{amount}} renter homes in {{year}}. Find out how your city compares at {{link}}
RANKINGS.SHARE_REGION_NO_SELECTION: {{amount}} renter homes {{action}} in {{region}} in {{year}}. {{topArea}} {{hadAmount}}. Find out where your city ranks at {{link}}
RANKINGS.SHARE_SELECTION: {{amount}} renter homes {{action}} in {{area}} in {{year}}. That's the {{ranking}} highest {{category}} among {{region}}'s {{areaType}}. Find out where your city ranks at {{link}}
